title: Belle is very “WTF you can TALK?” in the latest image from “Beauty and the Beast”
text:
Belle is very “WTF you can TALK?” in the latest image from “Beauty and the Beast” We’ve been getting spoiled with peeks and previews into what to expect from Disney’s live action Beauty and the Beast lately, between new photos and trailers, and we’re honestly enjoying every last minute and frame more than we could possibly say.
But we’ve found our new fav bit of the promo packages, and it’s this picture Entertainment Weekly shared of what looks like the moment when Bell e, aka Emma Watson, realizes that the home decor is also the most stimulating conversation she’s going to have while being held hostage by the Beast.
Behold: Emma Watson’s pitch perfect face upon being addressed by a candlestick and a clock. Disney We’re not sure what we love about this picture most. First of all, we’re super excited for how totally gorg this movie looks — the production value looks sky high, and we were already excited to see one of our childhood faves brought to life. Second of all, Cogsworth and Lumiere are so small? Like, they are a SO SMALL. We can’t wait to watch tiny Emma Watson stroll through this massive palace while talking to tiny, tiny people. This is a matryoshka doll of cute.
But also now that Beauty and the Beast is live action, we have to put ourselves in Belle’s shoes and imagine what our reaction would be to finding out that decorations that appear to have been purchased at Cost Plus World Market are not just sentient but also capable of a rousing musical number.
And lastly, we can’t help but think, “ohmygod that expression is so Hermione Granger after Harry and Ron have, once again, not done their homework.” 
Bring it on, Disney. Our bodies are ready.
